pages.text: $(li)The Leaping enchantment can be applied in a pair of Boots.$(br)$(li)This enchantment allows to you to double jump.$(br)$(li)The Leaping enchantment book only can be obtained in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l), Fishing, $(l:patchouli:illagers/raid)Raid$(/l) drops, or trading with a $(l:patchouli:villagers/librarian)Librarian$(/l).
pages.title: Leaping
